articles.title: Small businesses can start applying for new PPP loans - CNN
articles.description: For millions of small businesses still struggling to make ends meet, they may now apply for a new, potentially forgivable federal loan.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ari Levy
articles.title: Shopify just made a $2 billion windfall on Affirm IPO, six months after their partnership - CNBC
articles.description: Shopify signed a deal in July to make Affirm its provider of installment loans. In exchange, Shopify was given the option to buy over 20 million Affirm shares.
articles.content: Shopify just came off a huge growth year as the Covid-19 pandemic spurred massive growth in online shopping. Now it's starting 2021 with a bang thanks to an 8% stake in Affirm, the year's first notab… [+2858 chars]
